item.description:
***Please Update your RSVPs Monday for our reservation!***

This is the first in a series of After Work Italian Dinners at Italian Restaurants.

Tonight we will be visiting Ristorante Molise with Gianni and the Boston Euro Social Group.

Elisa, the founder of Ristorante Molise has reserved a section of her restaurant just for us.

We will be seated promptly at 7:00 pm for dinner. 

Meet at the bar at 6:15 pm for an optional glass of wine or cocktail.

Please RSVP if you plan to attend.

You will be asked to update your RSVP 1 week before the event and 2 days before the event so we may confirm the reservation. No Shows may be removed from the group.

Please review the Ristorante Molise web site www.restaurantmolise.com for more information and menu.

I have dined here many times and left happy and full.

Frank
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the Hostess for our Reserved Section
item.name: Italian Dinner Series-Ristorante Molise in Wakefield with Boston Euro Social
